name: Soma (itch) (Fat Cat Interactive)
description:
Soma is an atmospheric game about collecting "Soma" and growing as large as you can.

Try to stay on screen for as long as you can while collecting all the Soma. The blue repellers will push you around. As you collect more soma, you get points and grow larger, but with size there comes more repellers to push you away!

Soma was created during Game Jam Aotearoa with a theme of "Proximity".
